subject: Simsonn Pro Pedal with Simsonn Manager 2.0.8
description_text:
Hi. I want to use the latest software, but it says that the version of my
pedals is too old to use.
[image: image.png]

How can I fix this?

conversations.body_text: Hi Christian Aldover,  In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the plus.sfu file to update.

Thank you. The update works. On your website I saw screenshots that show
you can set the Max Brake force (kg) on the brake pedal, but I don't see
this in the software. Is there a way to enable this feature?

On Tue, Jul 1, 2025, 9:41 PM service@simsonn.com
你好，Christian Aldover，  旧版传感器和弹簧与现版有所不同。我们目前正在进行兼容性测试，测试完成并成功后，我们将发布最新版本。
